customer_reviews.title: Received a repackaged, refurbished, used camera and it is lighter than a Kleenex
customer_reviews.text: Total trash. Firstly, this camera was obviously used, returned and repacked as new. There are significant scratches on the front cover, as well as lines, dust and scratches on the LCD. Secondly, the battery cover is near impossible to open. Feels lighter than a pack of matches - makes me wonder if there is actually anything inside the camera body. The overall build quality is very cheap, unrefined and worse than a Chinese toy.

customer_reviews.title: This product is NO GOOD!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera for my grand daughter last Christmas because she wanted a "blue Polaroid Camera." Because she was out of the country it took 3 months for me to give it to her. To my dismay and total disappointment, the camera never worked even when we put brand new batteries in it. I could not send it back because it was more than 30 days since I'd received it; so I lost on both counts -- disappointment for my grand daughter and the money I spent to purchase this camera. I've place a lot of orders on Amazon and had a few issues but nothing to this extent. DON'T BUY THIS CAMERA!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great Waterproof Family Camera
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have asked for a better camera for our weekend at the indoor waterpark. It was easy enough for a 10 year old to use, as well as 40-something-year olds. I was skeptical for the price, what my results would be. We were quite surprised at how well the photos and videos did turn out. We took over 300 photos and videos over the weekend, and only needed to change the batteries once. I plan on getting more of these as gifts! Oh, we didn't splurge on a 32gb memory card for $11, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Julinoe

customer_reviews.title: terrbile camera even for kid quality
customer_reviews.text: Daughter received this camera as a gift. I thought she was just terrible at taking pictures, but even when I tried, the pictures came out blurry. The buttons for the menu items are not at all intuitive, even for an adult who has been around many different types of electronics. We have yet to try it underwater, but are now willing to give it a go because we don't care if it breaks. My 8 year old canon point and click still takes better pictures.

customer_reviews.title: Utter trash

Push the button, nothing happens Push the button, nothing happens Push the button, snaps a picture. If this sounds like fun to you then enjoy. Me? I returned it ASAP. Also the manual doesn't match the camera, the interface is confusing as heck and the picture quality (when you can take a picture) is garbage!

product_meta.title: Polaroid IS048 Waterproof Instant Sharing 16 MP Digital Portable Handheld Action Camera, Blue
product_meta.description: The Polaroid IS048 digital camera is the perfect adventure companion. At 16 MP, you can capture great images on-the-go and then preview them on the large 2. 4" Preview screen. Small and lightweight, it is easy to slip into your pocket so you're ready to capture your next favorite moment, on land or underwater! The Polaroid IS048 is completely waterproof up to 10 ft. so feel free to jump into a pool or lake! Save your memories to a micro SD card (not included) for Easy transfer to your computer or mobile device and then you can share them with all of your family and friends. Uses 2 AAA batteries.
feature_bullets: Excellent for underwater photography, fully submersible up to 10 feet
A great first camera for kids with enough features for novice photographers of any age
Tough and rugged with included protective cover
Can be used while swimming, snorkeling, or on dry land
Capture quality 16mp photos and HD video in an easy to use point and shoot camera
